page.title: 04POPULATION
page.content:
{Population of Crawcrook & Greenside {from 1801 to 1981. {1801}325 {1901}2450 {1811}268 {1911}3540 {1821}308 {1921}3800 {1831}340 {1931}4620 {1841}290 {1941}No figures {1851}320 available {1861}319 {1951}3610 {1871}346 {1961}4000 {1881}459 {1971}3990 {1891}1054 {1981}7260
At the beginning of the 19th Century the population was less than 400. This remained fairly steady until the beginning of this century when the local collieries opened, and continued to rise until 1930's when there were more than 4.5 thousand residents. There are no figures available for the war years. Continued on page 5.
